name: post-operative changes in the lung
description: Changes in the lung tissues observed after surgical procedures

attributes.name: location
attributes.description: The lung or lobe where the surgery took place

values.name: right lung
values.description: The entire right lung

values.name: left lung
values.description: The entire left lung

values.name: right upper lobe
values.description: Upper lobe of the right lung

values.name: right middle lobe
values.description: Middle lobe of the right lung

values.name: right lower lobe
values.description: Lower lobe of the right lung

values.name: left upper lobe
values.description: Upper lobe of the left lung

values.name: left lower lobe
values.description: Lower lobe of the left lung

values.name: lobectomy
values.description: Removal of a lobe of the lung

values.name: wedge resection
values.description: Removal of a small wedge-shaped portion of the lung

values.name: segmentectomy
values.description: Removal of a segment of the lung

values.name: pneumonectomy
values.description: Removal of an entire lung

values.name: pleurectomy
values.description: Removal of the pleura, the membrane that lines the lungs

values.name: transplant
values.description: Replacement of a diseased lung with a healthy lung from a donor

attributes.name: change from prior
attributes.description: Whether the changes are different from prior imaging

values.name: new
values.description: New changes

values.name: unchanged
values.description: Changes are the same as prior imaging; synonym of stable

values.name: improved
values.description: Changes are better than prior imaging

values.name: worsened
values.description: Changes are worse than prior imaging

examples.report_text: Stable postoperative changes in the right lung post lobectomy. No new pulmonary nodules observed.
Stable postoperative changes in the right lung post lobectomy. No new pulmonary nodules observed.
2.  Stable postsurgical changes in the left lung.
Postsurgical changes of right superior segment extremity. Unchanged right perihilar radiation fibrosis.
Postsurgical changes from right upper lobectomy, right lower lobe superior segmentectomy and left lower lobe wedge resection. Unchanged consolidative opacity in left lung apex.
Distinct post-surgical changes in the left lung. Airways remain clear.

Lungs: Postsurgical changes of left lower lobectomy. Unchanged mild peripheral scarring in the left lung. Redemonstrated diffuse mild bronchiectasis. Compensatory expansion of the right lung, as before. Patent central airways.
Stable postoperative changes in right lung base. No signs of pulmonary consolidation.
Postsurgical changes in the right lung following upper and middle lobectomy. No new pulmonary nodules.

name: post-operative changes in the lung
description: Changes in the lung tissue following a surgical procedure

attributes.name: location
attributes.description: The anatomical region of the post-operative changes

values.name: right lung
values.description: Changes are in the right lung

values.name: left lung
values.description: Changes are in the left lung

values.name: upper lobe
values.description: Changes are in the upper lobe of the lung

values.name: middle lobe
values.description: Changes are in the middle lobe of the lung

values.name: lower lobe
values.description: Changes are in the lower lobe of the lung

attributes.name: change
attributes.description: The nature of the post-operative change in the lung

values.name: stable
values.description: The changes have remained the same over time

values.name: unchanged
values.description: The changes have not altered since last observation

values.name: worsening
values.description: The changes have deteriorated since last observation

values.name: improved
values.description: The changes have improved since last observation

values.name: increased
values.description: The changes have increased in extent or severity

values.name: similar
values.description: The changes are similar to a previous observation

attributes.name: associated findings
attributes.description: Additional findings associated with the post-operative changes

values.name: nodule
values.description: An abnormal growth of tissue

values.name: scarring
values.description: Areas of fibrous tissue that replace normal tissue after injury

values.name: bronchiectasis
values.description: Permanent enlargement of the airways of the lung

values.name: atelectasis
values.description: Partial or complete collapse of the lung

values.name: consolidation
values.description: An area of the lung tissue filled with liquid instead of air

values.name: pleural effusion
values.description: Excess fluid that accumulates in the pleural cavity

values.name: pneumothorax
values.description: Presence of air or gas in the pleural space

values.name: emphysema
values.description: Damage to the air sacs in the lungs leading to shortness of breath

values.name: calcified granuloma
values.description: A mass of tissue that forms in response to infection or inflammation, and has become calcified over time

values.name: airways patent
values.description: The airways of the lungs are clear and unblocked

values.name: lobectomy
values.description: Surgical removal of a lobe of the lung

values.name: wedge resection
values.description: Surgical removal of a triangular section of tissue, often used to remove a tumor and a small amount of surrounding healthy tissue
